store.name: Tony's Salsa
store.description: Selling the best homemade salsa since 1998. Based in Plano, TX.

products.name: The Original
products.description: The original salsa, a tomato and onion based salsa made with 5 whole jalapenos and 1 habanero pepper per 8 oz jar

products.name: Verde Salsa
products.description: Our second best seller, a salsa made with tomatillos and zesty lime. Mild in spice.
